paper_metadata.title: Impact of Productive Safety Net Program intervention on food security of rural households in rural western Ethiopia

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: This study examined the impact of Productive Safety Net Program intervention on food security of rural households in rural western Ethiopia... The mean energy available for the beneficiary and non-beneficiary households is 2488.500 and 2153.394 kcal, respectively.
study_characteristics.study_design: Cross-sectional survey with Propensity Score Matching
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: A cross-sectional survey data were gathered from a total of randomly selected 188 beneficiary and non-beneficiary sample households... The propensity score matching method was used to evaluate the impact

bonus_information.qualitative_evidence_citation: Key informants interviews and focus group discussions were employed to triangulate household survey results

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: From various Ethiopian government food security strategies, the Productive Safety Net Program (PSNP) is one of the strategies to improve households' consumption
evidence_citations.country_citation: This study examined the impact of Productive Safety Net Program intervention on food security of rural households in rural western Ethiopia
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: This study examined the impact of Productive Safety Net Program intervention on food security of rural households in rural western Ethiopia
